title: Eden and Gainful® Join Forces to Support the GLP-1 Journey With Personalized Nutrition
description: Eden, the health platform that connects members with independent, licensed providers for personalized health care, today announced a partnership with Gainful, the leader in clean, personalized performance nutrition. The collaboration unites Eden's provider-led treatment ecosystem with Gainful's customizable protein, hydration and gut-health formulas, creating an end-to-end experience designed specifically for individuals approved by licensed providers to use GLP-1-based therapies.
content:
Collaboration launches integrated pathway pairing licensed-provider GLP-1 programs with personalized protein, hydration and greens bundles for comprehensive metabolic support.

DENVER, Aug. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- , the health platform that connects members with independent, licensed providers for personalized health care, today announced a partnership with , the leader in clean, personalized performance nutrition. The collaboration unites Eden's provider-led treatment ecosystem with Gainful's customizable protein, hydration and gut-health formulas, creating an end-to-end experience designed specifically for individuals approved by licensed providers to use GLP-1-based therapies.

"Members told us they wanted a simple, science-backed way to match their medications with everyday nutrition," said Josh Khan, President of Eden "By weaving Gainful's personalized supplements and on-demand dietitian chat into our provider network, we're empowering people to protect muscle, stay hydrated and feel their best while pursuing sustainable metabolic health."

Gainful's new GLP-1supplementation bundle, featuring Lean Protein, Electrolytes, Daily Greens and Gut-Health Performance Boost, addresses common needs such as muscle preservation, electrolyte balance and digestive comfort. Eden members who initiate or maintain GLP-1 treatment through Eden's licensed clinicians will receive exclusive access to these products, plus tailored guidance from both Gainful registered dietitians and Eden nutritional educators.

Jahaan Ansari, Founder of Gainful, added, "Our mission has always been to make science-backed customizable performance nutrition accessible to everyone. Partnering with Eden lets us extend that promise to a fast-growing community that deserves coordinated medical and nutritional support."
• Integrated Assessment. Eden's onboarding now offers an optional Gainful nutrition quiz, pre-filled with GLP-1-specific questions, to generate a personalised supplement plan alongside the member's clinical evaluation.
• Co-Branded Bundles & Fulfilment. Qualifying Eden members can add Gainful GLP-1 bundles to their monthly treatment shipments for seamless doorstep delivery.
• Dual-Expert Support. Members gain complimentary nutrition guidance from Gainful plus follow-up consults with Eden-connected providers to fine-tune dosing, protein targets and lifestyle habits.
• Education Hub. A new content series, "Fueling Your GLP-1 Journey," will be published across both brands, featuring practical tips from Eden's Nutritional Educator Joe Ghafari and Gainful's Science Advisory Board.
summary: Eden Health Platform, a health platform connecting members with independent, licensed providers for personalized health care, has partnered with Gainful, the leader in clean, personalized performance nutrition. The collaboration unites Eden's provider-led treatment ecosystem with Gain's customizable protein, hydration and gut-health formulas, designed for individuals approved by licensed providers to use GLP-1-based therapies. The partnership includes an integrated assessment, co-branded Bundles & Fulfilment, complimentary nutrition guidance from Gainful and follow-up consults with Eden-connected providers to fine-tune dosing, protein targets and lifestyle habits.
shortSummary: Eden and Gainful's partnership integrates comprehensive GLP-1 treatment with personalized performance nutrition bundles, providing comprehensive nutrition and hydration support for patients.

Take the first step and Join 75,000+ members supporting their fitness and wellness goals.*
If you’re exploring GLP-1 treatment options but aren’t sure where to start, Eden can help connect you with independent, licensed healthcare providers for a medical evaluation. These providers can assess your eligibility for GLP-1-based medications, available in oral or injectable forms, and prescribe them if appropriate through state-licensed pharmacies.
Access same-day, online consultations to review your health profile and discuss whether a GLP-1 medication, such as semaglutide, injectable or oral, may be an option for you.
Our clean supplements help you maintain energy, preserve muscle, and feel your best throughout your journey.
Both Eden and Gainful provide ongoing coaching, monitoring, and education. You're never alone in this.
Fixed, transparent pricing with no contracts, hidden fees, or insurance barriers. Just patient-first care at every stage.
GLP-1s are good tools to support weight management, but you may notice changes in appetite or eating habits. While Gainful products aren't designed to treat or prevent any effects of medication, their GLP-1 Starter Pack was created to help support general wellness goals like staying hydrated, getting enough protein, and maintaining a nutrient rich diet, especially when your routine changes.
Prevent fatigue, dizziness, and muscle cramps, common with reduced food and water intake.
Maintain muscle and metabolism with science-backed daily protein.
Ease constipation and bloating with clinically effective prebiotic fiber and probiotics.
Support immunity, energy, and nutrient balance, without overwhelming your stomach.

Personalized weight care meets performance nutrition
Your wellness routine just got smarter
Eden and Gainful have partnered to bring together personalized care and focused nutrition for metabolic support, personalized to your goals and grounded in science.

GLP-1 treatments have been clinically shown to*
Reset your metabolism and burn more calories
Help lower your blood pressure

Stop food noise and reduce cravings

*Along with a reduced calorie diet and increased exercise. Based on two separate Wegovy® clinical studies. In a 68-week study, about 1 in 3 adults with obesity or overweight and weight-related conditions achieved 20% weight loss. Average weight loss achieved was 15%. In a 104-week study, mean weight loss achieved at 2 years was 15.2% vs. 2.6% for placebo. Individual results may vary. Stopping treatment may result in weight regain.
**Wegovy® is indicated to treat weight loss, but also has been shown to improve blood pressure, cholesterol, or blood glucose levels.

argos_summary: Eden has partnered with Gainful to create an integrated health platform that combines licensed-provider GLP-1 programs with personalized nutrition bundles, including protein, hydration, and greens. This collaboration aims to provide comprehensive metabolic support for individuals using GLP-1 therapies, offering tailored supplements and expert guidance from dietitians. Members can access customized nutrition plans, co-branded product bundles, and ongoing support to enhance their health journey.
